description: For getting to the end of the trail without bringing the forest with you.  Whether you ride a nimble enduro bike or a bomber downhill machine, these shoes keep you on top of things. You get a huge range of cleat adjustment plus ultra-grippy soles if you're not quite clipped in. Armoured lace shield keeps debris out and the toe cap protects your piggies.Synthetic leather upper sheds mud and snow while perforations let heat escape.Hydrophobic materials dry quickly and absorb less water.Medium-stiff midsole dampens shock but maintains comfortable flex.Moulded toe cap protects you from roots and rocks in the trail.Speed lacing closure locks in your foot and armoured shield protects from debris.Low profile rubber sole is stable and high traction even if you're not clipped in.Compatible with 2-bolt cleats with expanded cleat adjustment.
name: Shimano AM9 Cycling Shoes - Unisex
